RGBColor::­operator=

Copyright (C) 2005 IENT-RWTH Aachen

template<class U1,class U2,class U3> inline RGBColor &RGBColor::operator=(const YUVColor<U1,U2,U3> &r)

Assignment Operator

Returns

A reference to the current object.

Remarks

This sets this object (on the left-hand-side of the operator) to the value given on the right of the operator.
